name: Blue Twighlight
description:
Caught that beautiful moment of the last light, almost ultraviolet, at West Beach, West Bay, Bridport.
Digital painting.
Epson archival quality inks on heavyweight 220gsm matt canvas paper (coated linen) A3 signed print. Free P&P UK.

name: Sailing Out of West Bay
description:
A very beautiful digital painting, heading into an early summer's evening, West Bay, Dorset. 
Epson archival quality inks on heavyweight 220gsm matt canvas paper (coated linen) A3 signed print. Free P&P UK.

This is a panoramic view, so there is white space appears above and below the image at A3 size.

Contact us for exact measurements if required.

name: Gift Voucher £25 - £45
description:
... to £45. Please click drop down menu for optins.
As with jewellery and perfume, it's very tricky to know which print a loved one would like best. Solve the problem with a gift voucher! 
Gift vouchers can be used for any print of matching price (prints only, not other items in the store). These are only available for prints to be delivered within UK - but we can quote you for international gift vouchers and postage if you contact us. Delivery free as always.
Vouchers can be topped up at checkout via paypal for items of higher value.
Your voucher is sent as an email to you to send to your loved one. 
If your recipient chooses a print of lower value than the voucher, we're sorry, but we can't refund the difference. But both of you will receive a discount on your next order.

name: Cards - "Another Normal Christmas"
description: Available ONLY from Bridport Arts Centre, not via this shop. Christmas can so often end up being..well, a bit surreal Send something different this year..original designs by artist Bob Dron. Professionally printed on quality card. Shown as "coming soon" to prevent online payments, they are on sale now. Price per card. More Christmas designs here

name: Cards - More from "Another Normal Christmas"
description: Available ONLY from Bridport Arts Centre, not via this shop. name: Red Sail, West Bay
description:
A very beautiful digital painting, heading into an early summer's evening, West Bay, Dorset.
Epson archival quality inks on heavyweight 220gsm matt canvas paper (coated linen) A3 signed print. Free P&P UK.

This is a panoramic view, so there is white space appears above and below the image at A3 size.

Contact us for exact measurements if required.

name: Margaret Is Making Tea - Giclee Signed Print
description:
Iconic - the oldest kiosk at West Bay, known and loved by locals and visitors for generations.
And the unstoppable Margaret is still there - you can see her if you look closely.
Digital painting. Lower image gives an idea of the painterly quality when seen at larger scale. 
Epson archival quality inks on A3 heavyweight 220gsm matt canvas paper (coated linen) 
To avoid all possibility of damage in post, these are sent rolled in sturdy tube packaging - with all P&P on us. Yes. FREE!

Wide white border top and bottom - this does not fill A3 as it is panoramic. Note actual image size is approx: 17cm x 41cm

name: River to the Sea
description:
Mist rolls in as the late afternoon becomes evening.
Digital painting of view from bridge over harbour/river mouth towards the flood meadows, West Bay. 

Epson archival quality inks on heavyweight 220gsm matt canvas paper (coated linen) A3 signed print.

name: Going Out
description:
Bridport, early evening; digital painting.
Small image on screen makes it hard for you to see the painterly quality and finish of this work.
Please note the lower zoom detail image to get some idea of the large print's appearance (and don't forget to try Ctr + on your keypad).
Epson archival quality inks on heavyweight 220gsm matt canvas paper (coated linen) A3 signed print.

name: Eggardon Prints Series
description:
Views from Eggardon, Dorset
Digital painting
Printed with Epson archival quality inks on heavyweight 220gsm matt canvas paper (coated linen)
A3 420 x 297 mm (16.5 x 11.7 in)

P&P FREE

name: Sea Storm Series: Rollers and Breakers
description: Storm force winds drive huge waves onto West Beach, West Bay, Dorset. Epson archival quality inks on heavyweight 220gsm matt canvas paper (coated linen) A3 signed photgraphic print. More from this range here ..and here

name: Sunset, Sidmouth
description:
Looking West.
Digital painting.
A3 print, signed.
220gsm matt canvas paper (coated linen).
P&P free (UK only - rest of world, please contact for shipping rates).

name: "This Is The Sea" - Giclee Artist Signed Prints
description:
From the original mixed media painting. Choose from two options for this title:
Medium sized print - 12" x 16"
Image size without border is: 11.4 x 14.9 inches.
Large Print: 17.7 x 23.6"
450 x 600mm (roughly the same as the original piece).


Whatever the size, the print uses Epson archival quality inks on heavyweight 220gsm matt canvas paper (coated linen)
To avoid all possibility of damage in post, these are sent rolled in sturdy tube packaging - with all P&P on us. Yes. FREE!

options.name: This Is The Sea - medium size

name: Summer's Started
description:
Bridport, looking westwards towards Colmer's, first fine evening of June.
Digital painting.
Epson archival quality inks on heavyweight 220gsm matt canvas paper (coated linen) A3 signed print.
Currently I sign these on the white border; if you'd like me to sign on the actual picture, so it can be seen when framed without a border, just say so in message space on Paypal when ordering.

description:

Epson archival quality inks on heavyweight 220gsm matt canvas paper (coated linen) A3 print hand signed individually by the artist. Please state if you want this signed on the back, otherwise it will be on the front, just below printed area. 
To avoid all possibility of damage in post, these are sent rolled in sturdy tube packaging, p&p FREE.

name: Now There Are Several (Fish in Harbour Series)
description:
Low tide in the harbour; the sluice gates are opened a little to let the river flow out to sea - and these large mullet come to enjoy it.
Epson archival quality inks on heavyweight 220gsm matt canvas paper (coated linen)
16.5 x 11.7 in
420 x 297 mm
(Thin white border around image).
Please click Products link at top of page to see the rest of the series. 

To avoid all possibility of damage in post, these are sent rolled in sturdy tube packaging, p&p FREE.

If for any reason you require prints sent flat, this requires far more packaging to prevent the PO bending, denting, or even piercing straight through, plus costs significantly more for postage due to new size tariffs. We'd be happy to give you a quote, including insurance.

name: Shoal of Fry (Fish in Harbour series)
description:
The extremely attractive colours and textures are created in part by a vast shoal of fry sweeping through the water. 
Very close up, you can identify individuals. By which I mean, you can see the little baby fish. Not necessarily know which one is Clive or Petunia. 
These are mullet, presumably, in the harbour at West Bay. 
Please click on Products link at top of page to see the rest of the series.

Epson archival quality inks on heavyweight 220gsm matt canvas paper (coated linen) 
16.5 x 11.7 in 
420 x 297 mm 
(small white border of about 5mm within this - always ask if you want extra precise measurements)
FREE p&p  


To avoid all possibility of damage in post, these are sent rolled in sturdy tube packaging, p&p FREE.

If for any reason you require prints sent flat, this requires far more packaging to prevent the PO bending, denting, or even piercing straight through, plus costs significantly more for postage due to new size tariffs. We'd be happy to give you a quote, including insurance.

name: There Are Two Fish (Fish in Harbour Series)
description:
Mullet in the harbour, West Bay.

One fish is clear.
You catch a glimpse of another below, whirring up from the depths, flicking sand in a stream behind him.
Amazing play of light through the water.
In an A3 print, this almost fills the area.
Printed with Epson archival quality inks on heavyweight 220gsm matt canvas paper (coated linen) 
A3 print 420 x 297 mm (16.5 x 11.7 in) 
Image size: 27.5cm x 38.5cm
Larger sizes available - (does look stunning the larger it gets!)
Please click on Products link at top of page to see the rest of the series.
FREE P&P


To avoid all possibility of damage in post, these are sent rolled in sturdy tube packaging, p&p FREE.

If for any reason you require prints sent flat, this requires far more packaging to prevent the PO bending, denting, or even piercing straight through, plus costs significantly more for postage due to new size tariffs. We'd be happy to give you a quote, including insurance.
